titles.title: SF298 Christ the Lord is risen today!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ the Lord is risen today! Alleluia!
All creation joins to say Alleluia!
Raise your joys and triumphs high; Alleluia!
Sing, you heavens, let earth, reply; Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love's redeeming work is done, Alleluia!
Fought the fight, the battle won: Alleluia!
Vain the stone, the watch, the seal, Alleluia!
Christ hath burst the gates of hell; Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lives again our glorious King: Alleluia!
Where, O death, is now your sting! Alleluia!
Once He died our souls to save: Alleluia!
Where's your victory, boasting grave? Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Soar we now where Christ hath led, Alleluia!
Following our exalted Head: Alleluia!
Made like Him, like Him we rise; Alleluia!
Ours the Cross, the grave, the skies. Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
King of Glory! Soul of bliss! Alleluia!
Everlasting life is this, Alleluia!
Thee to know, your power to prove, Alleluia!
Thus to sing, and thus to love Alleluia!
